title: 12 Indian fishermen arrested for poaching in Sri Lankan waters
content: Sri Lanka Navy personnel have seized 02 Indian trawlers along with 12 Indian fishermen onboard, whilst poaching in Sri Lankan waters, in an operation conducted in seas north of Talaimannar.The North Central Naval Command conducted this operation in seas north of Talaimannar in the dark hours of 12th February deploying Fast Attack Craft of the 4th Fast Attack Flotilla and seized these 02 Indian trawlers which were engaging in the illegal fishing method of ‘bottom trawling’ in Sri Lankan waters, via the International Maritime Boundary Line (IMBL).The Navy also nabbed 12 Indian fishermen aboard the poaching vessels in this operation.
